function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];

p = result.match(/chapters\:\s(\[.*\])/);

  let arr = JSON.parse(p[1]);
  arr.reverse();
  result = JSON.stringify(arr);
} else {
  java.log('未匹配到相关内容');
}
result
</js>

headers={

}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: .text-small@a@span@text##\s
ruleBookInfo.intro: var novelIntro=({title,author,genre,score,desc})=>['','✧*̥₊˚‧☆･ﾟ'.repeat(3),`📖书名：《${title}》`,`👤作者：${author}`,`🏷️类型：${genre}`,`✨最新章节：${latestChapterTitle}`,'✦ ─────────────── ✦',`${desc}`,'❈'.padEnd(20,'～*')].join('\n').replace(/^/gm,'　　'); var latestChapterTitle=`{{@@.my-unit-md@span@text}}` var intro=`{{@@.text-medium@text##最近章節}}` novelIntro({ "title": book.name, "author": book.author, "genre": book.kind, "latestChapterTitle":latestChapterTitle, "desc": intro }) ##(^|[。！？]+[”」）】]?)##$1
ruleBookInfo.name: .text-xl@textNodes

ruleContent.content: var data=JSON.parse(result) var imageList=data.data.info.images.images var imgTags = imageList.map(item => ``).join('\n'); imgTags;

r;
</js>

<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/127.0.0.0",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
if (!/qyyuapi/.test(baseUrl)) {
    var res = JSON.parse(result).data.pages;
    var pages = res.pages;
    var page = res.page;
    var urls = [];
    if (pages > 1 && page == 1) {
        for (i = 2; i <= pages; i++) {
            path = baseUrl.replace(/.*(comics.*page=).*/, '$1') + i;
            url = Get('url') + '/' + path;
            urls.push(url);
        }
        urls;
    }
}
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(Reload('https://qyyuapi.com/sy/js/阿吧漫画/exploreUrl.js')));
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/127.0.0.0",
    "Referer": Get('url'),
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

  • ${sl}张图${sj}

	}
</js>

ruleSearch.name:
<js>
let hj=java.get('sshj');
let cos=java.get('cos');

if (hj=='') {
	let rr=String(java.getString('a@text'));
	let nm = rr.match(/\[([^\[\]]+)\]\-?\s*([^\[\]]+)/);
	if(!nm&&cos==1) nm=rr.match(/(^.+)\s+[–\-]\s+(.+$)/);
	if (nm&&!/^3d$/i.test(nm[1])) {java.put('anm',nm[1]); result=nm[2];}
	else {java.put('anm',rr); result=rr;}
	}
else {java.put('anm','合集'); result='📚'+hj;}

result
</js>
